headline: The Smartest Steel Stocks to Buy With $2,000 Right Now
summary: Here's why Nucor (NYSE: NUE) and Steel Dynamics (NASDAQ: STLD) are the smartest steel stocks to buy if you have $2,000 or $20,000 right now.  There are blast furnaces, which make primary steel, and electric arc mini-mills, which melt down scrap steel to make fresh steel out of it.
